doc:
Keith Ferguson (voice actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Keith_Ferguson_(voice_actor) 0 Keith James Ferguson (born February 26, 1972) is an American voice actor best known for the voice-over roles of Bloo Kazoo from Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends, Basch fon Ronsenburg from Final Fantasy XII, Marluxia from Kingdom Hearts, Lord Hater from Wander Over Yonder, Lord Saladin Forge from Destiny and Destiny 2 and Reaper from Overwatch. He also provides a number of "sound-alike" portrayals in the VO industry, including Harrison Ford's Han Solo and Indiana Jones in Robot Chicken and the voice of Lightning McQueen in Cars Toons and Cars video games, replacing Owen Wilson in that role. Keith_James_Ferguson ( born February_26_,_1972 ) is an_American_voice_actor best known for the_voice-over_roles of Bloo_Kazoo from Foster 's_Home for Imaginary_Friends , Basch_fon_Ronsenburg from Final_Fantasy_XII , Marluxia from Kingdom_Hearts , Lord_Hater from Wander Over Yonder , Lord_Saladin_Forge from Destiny_and_Destiny_2 and Reaper from Overwatch . He also provides a_number of "_sound-alike_"_portrayals in the_VO_industry , including Harrison_Ford 's_Han_Solo and Indiana_Jones in Robot_Chicken and the_voice of Lightning_McQueen in Cars_Toons_and_Cars_video_games , replacing Owen_Wilson in that_role .
